title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must show appropriate work in order to receive the point.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include the criterion below.
The response accurately includes the criterion below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include the criterion below.
The response accurately includes the criterion below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does none of the following.
The response does one of the following.
The response does two of the following.
The response does all of the following.
